quest.name: The Soul's Remembrance
journal: Yana is deeply concerned about the new recruits.
objectives: Weaken and then hit the poisoned Confederates with a puff of stunning powder.

dialogue.name: YANA
dialogue.text: Ah, you appear incredibly strong! Might I ask your help with something?

dialogue.name: YANA
dialogue.text: Some of our new recruits were poisoned by a shiranui earlier and have turned feral.

dialogue.name: YANA
dialogue.text: My comrade to the northeast of our headquarters is dealing with them as we speak. I fear, however, that he may need reinforcements. Could you please go and assist him?

dialogue.name: YANA
dialogue.text: Please will you help my comrade save the recruits affected by shiranui poison? You should be able to find them to the northeast of our headquarters.

dialogue.name: BIGANDBRAWNYMAN02685
dialogue.text: Thank the kami you came! The poison has turned these men to beasts and bringing this one down has drained me of most of my strength. There are two others, however, who are still rampaging along the coastline. I need you to stop them.

dialogue.name: BIGANDBRAWNYMAN02685
dialogue.text: They should be quite easy to spot. Even if you do not catch sight of them, if you are in the area long enough, they will come to you. Hereâ”€take this stunning powder.

dialogue.name: BIGANDBRAWNYMAN02685
dialogue.text: Tire them out with a few well-placed jabs then blow this into their faces. I shall then come around and collect them. Oh, and do take care not to hit too hard. I would hate to have to report a death on my watch.

dialogue.name: BIGANDBRAWNYMAN02685
dialogue.text: Tire them out, then blow the stunning powder into their faces. It should paralyze them long enough for me to find and collect them.

dialogue.name: YANA
dialogue.text: Please hurry! Unless they are stopped soon, there is no telling how much damage they will do!

dialogue.name: BIGANDBRAWNYMAN02685
dialogue.text: You finished? Great! I will take it from here.

dialogue.name: BIGANDBRAWNYMAN02685
dialogue.text: While I am tending to my men, might you return to Yana and let her know that everything is now under control?

dialogue.name: YANA
dialogue.text: What a relief it is to hear that everyone is fine. <sigh> That such a mess could arise in the first place, however, still puzzles me. I would have thought it common sense to avoid approaching a shiranui.

dialogue.name: YANA
dialogue.text: It is said these beasts are the souls of men and women who died at sea. In never having been buried, they are unable to find closure and remain upon this earth, poisoning the souls of the living with their noxious breath.

dialogue.name: YANA
dialogue.text: Perhaps the people of Koshu never learned the tale, and that is why our new batch of underlings did not have the sense to run when they saw the creature.

dialogue.name: YANA
dialogue.text: If you can help it, you best stay far away from them, too! Keep safe my friend!
